https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5dPInS682cQJ5caEnGlEDKFSoge.jpg Raju, an orphan, falls in love with Riya Roy, the daughter of business tycoon Mahendra Roy. However, the couple faces difficulties as Mahendra Roy has already selected another boy for Riya. Chirasathi
